Mark Angel (amụrụ na 27 Mee na afọ 1991) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe ọchị, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta vidiyo

A maara ya nke ọma maka usoro mkpirikpi Mark Angel Comedy na YouTube, na-egosipụtakarị ụmụaka na-eme ihe ọchị dịka nwa nwanne ya, Emmanuella Samuel (afọ ịrị abụọ ), nwa nwanne ya nwanyị, na nwa nwanne ya nwoke "Aunty" Success Madubuike (afọ 8). Angel's YouTube channel bụ nke mbụ African comedy channel iru otu nde debanyere aha. Mark mmụọ ozi nwekwara nwunye nke na-emekwa ihe ọchị na akara mmụọ ozi na-eme ihe ọchị na ndị na-eme ya na ndị na ya na-eme egwuregwu bụ Maazị Azu, Baze10, Ebere, The Law, Mimi, Kingsley Brown.
A mụrụ Angel na afọ 1991 na Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria. Ọ gara Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo iji mụọ ọgwụ, mana ọ hapụrụ n'ihi ihe ezinụlọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na India ma nọrọ oge na Naijiria na-enweta ahụmịhe na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri, mana ọ pụghị ịchọta ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ na Nollywood
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri onwe ya na afọ 2013 n'okpuru ụlọ ọrụ ya, Mechanic Pictures. Ọ bụ onye na-akwado Chelsea FC.
Ọ na  ahọta Igbo na Yoruba, asụsụ abụọ a na-asụkarị na obodo Naịjirịa.
